subject: Jury System
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
Decisions and Verdicts
Perjury
lead_paragraph: The federal judge presiding over Barry Bonds’s perjury case ruled that jurors’ names will be kept confidential to protect them from being contacted or harassed by reporters or the public.
snippet: The federal judge presiding over Barry Bonds’s perjury case ruled that jurors’ names will be kept confidential to protect them from being contacted or harassed by reporters or the public.
